## VectorLayer.count() method

Counts entities that match given find options or conditions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static count<T extends VectorLayer>(this: ObjectType<T>, optionsOrConditions?: FindManyOptions<T> | PropertiesFilter<T>): Promise<number>;
```
